participant_1.background:

i own an iphone.
I had a minor surgery on my hand last year, but I'm all healed up now.
i like watching tv in my free time as well.

participant_2.background:
I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.
I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I enjoy eating fruit with my child when we spend time together.
I enjoy playing tennis with my mother, and it is a great way for us to stay fit.

content.text: Not much. I just ate a pizza, do you like pizza?
Sure do, I love it! In fact, I just started a webcomic about my love of Game of Thrones and my ink stained shirts.
That sounds cool! I have never really gotten into webcomics, but I am always up for trying new things.
You should check it out sometime! It's called "Game of Thrones and Ink Stained Shirts".
I will definitely do that! What else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and read. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Those are all great ways to spend your free time! I love to spend time with my family and friends too. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite genre is probably role-playing games.
I love role-playing games too! I have been playing a lot of Skyrim lately.
Skyrim is a great game! I have played it a lot too.
It is so much fun! I love exploring the world and doing quests.
Me too! It is so immersive and the world is so detailed.
I agree! It is one of my favorite games of all time.
It is definitely one of mine too!
